header2.heading: We Are Simulation
header2.text: Appreciating the varying needs of simulation complexity and simulation time needed by the different profile of customers, SeerEye opted for a Simulation as a Service business model.

header3.heading: We Are Designer
header3.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

welcome.title: welcome to
welcome.title_content: SeerEye is a Simaas solution tackling the market's main pain point. Our simulation software solution is highly scalable and can accommodate an almost infinite number of data streams without any loss of quality

box1.title: Highly scalable
box1.content: A highly scalable simulation environment able to simulate quickly and efficiently millions of edge case scenarios.

box2.title: Fully synchronous
box2.content: Fully synchronous simulation capable to process in real time an inscresing number of data streams without loss of image quality or increase in latency

box3.title: Handle more sensors
box3.content: Current available simulation softwares achieve at best up to 2 or 3 sensors data processing before loosing in quality. Seereye offers an almost infinite number of sensors.

strategy.title: How we offer
strategy.content: Appreciating the varing needs of simulation complexity and simulation time needed by the different profile of customers, SeerEye opted for a simulation as a Service (SimaaS) business model

list.pay-what-you-need: Only pay for the services of simulation you need, the complexity you require and the time and amount of simulation you intend to run
list.subscription: High complexity and volume customer will be offered subscription models instead of a pay per use model.

who-we-serve.content: We have over a decade of experience in the creative industry, producing exciting experiences for brands that are as smart, as they are effective.

suppliers.title: OEM and Tier 1, Tier 2 suppliers
suppliers.content: OEM and Tier in need of highly scalable, high fidelity synchronous multi data stream simulations.

regulating-autorities.title: Regulating Autorities
regulating-autorities.content: Regulating autorities using simulation to test autonomous infrastructure roll out.

academic.title: Academic Research
academic.content: Academic Research using simulation to further develop AV algorithm computing

faq.subtitle: Those are the most common questions regarding our application, don't hesitate to contact us directly if your question is still not answered.

question1.question: Is there a free version or a demo
question1.answer: Unfortunately there's no demo, but we have video showcasing the application's abilities

question2.question: What kind of sensor are available
question2.answer: by default we support 5 types of sensor, lidar ....

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.title_content: We are available 24h 5 days a week
